data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Dolichomitus Smith (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Pimplinae) from Vietnam, with description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Nhi Thi, Broad, Gavin R., Zwakhals, Kees (2012): First record of the genus Dolichomitus Smith (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Pimplinae) from Vietnam, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 3519: 77-84, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209992
